body.name: Swiss Madison Well Made Forever SM-1T106 Concorde One Piece Toilet, Glossy White

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Swiss Madison Well Made Forever Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 47 mins
features: Dual flush with high-performance gravity 0.8/1.28 gallon per flush (gpf)
Seamless porcelain one-piece with an easy-to-clean design.
Square bowl offers added room and comfort.
Soft Closing Seat closes gently and quietly.
Quick-Release seat can be unlatched from the toilet for easy removal and convenient cleaning; no tools required.
body.description: The Concorde Dual Flush Square One-Piece Toilet is designed for luxury and performance. The Concorde features a concealed trapway with a sleek skirted design that is both visually appealing and makes for easy cleaning. The strong dual flush function is very dependable offering a never-failing performance.

productInformation.value: #115,390 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #42 in One-Piece Toilets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern and Functional
reviews.reviewText: This toilet isn’t the most comfortable and the seats are hard to locate replacements for, but it seems extremely sturdy and is reliable as far as function from my experience with the 2 I purchased. The toilet is very modern looking and makes my newly remodeled bathrooms feel high end. Install isn’t too hard but be careful unboxing as it is easy to fling the tank lid out of the styrofoam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Shows well and easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: Been looking for a newly remodeled master bathroom. As we are finishing and overspent we were looking to get quality good looking toilet without breaking the bank. The toilet looks great and sturdy. Easy to install.Double flash for water saving!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Clogs WAY too Often.
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn't touch this product (again) with a ten-foot barge pole...and that's what you'll need to clear it every other day. Like MANY others have written elsewhere, we have found that BOTH ours clog easily and necessitate serious plunging in order to clear the blockage. They look good but the water cistern (tank) lids are ill fitting and the push buttons assembly on the top tarnishes and starts to peel within a year. Finally, the seats are really cheap and nasty and the slow-close mechanism on one of ours broke within a year. I would suggest you avoid at all costs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Toilet looks like Toto so it’s beautiful but the seat is not comfortable at all snd very hard to find a new seat with that exact size so if your looking for beautiful go for it but know it’s not comfortable to sit on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The good, bad, and ugly
reviews.reviewText: I firmly believe in balanced reviews. Having said that: the good: shipping was perfect. In time and on time. (Actually 2 days early). Packaging was impressive. Not a scratch or Nick anywhere. Toilet was perfect. The bad: none. However, the ugly: I have nothing nice to say about the installation. I had many choice words not suitable for a PG audience. Lining up the floor bolts sucks. You have to kind of guess. Hooking up the water supply is equally miserable. Tightening floor bolts is equally miserable. I recommend a deep socket instead of wrench. Having said all that, it’s a great looking, well built toilet. Have fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the toilet. Super heavy but looks great in my bathroom…. So glad I went with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very stylish toilet
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and elegant throne. Love the self closure feature

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks great. Hard to install
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our powder bathroom and got to say it really helps bring a certain level of coolness to the room. It definitely as hard to install as they say. I would recommend getting one of those nicer, perfect seal rubber toilet rings because it can adjust, has two blue tabs that are easier to line up where you’ll place it and tighten the bolts to. Our base plate was raised so we didn’t need the blue extender part for that. I would also recommend having 3 people help install. Yup, 3 people. Two people to gently lower it. And 1 person checking each side to make sure the toilet is lining up where the bolts are and helping finely directing the placement of the toilet over those bolts. If you miss the placement with a standard wax ring, you’ll have to try again. It also is a tad longer in back so I’d also recommend a flexible hose that connects to the toilet instead of rigid pipe to allow you to get it connected. We were able to tighten the bolts with a 11mm wrench (or 10mm, around there ish).The seat itself isn’t really comfortable, but this is a fun powder room and not a main one, so it doesn’t get used super often.
